long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep TEAMS / SLACK always online, no away anymore!!!

How to use it?

Step1 Turn on this extension.
Step2 Open a new tab to login Teams web or slack web, eg: https://teams.microsoft.com/v2/, https://app.slack.com/. DO NOT close this tab.
Step3 Turn off your computer auto hibernate.

Teams Desktop or Slack Desktop will always online, never away anymore.
